title: HTML Lists
gp1: HTML lists allow web developers to group a set of related items in lists.
gp2: An unordered list starts with the <ul> tag. Each list item starts with the <li> tag.
gp3: The list items will be marked with bullets (small black circles) by default:
wp1: An ordered list starts with the <ol> tag. Each list item starts with the <li> tag.
wp2: The list items will be marked with numbers by default:
wp3: A description list is a list of terms, with a description of each term.
wp4: The <dl> tag defines the description list, the <dt> tag defines the term (name), and the <dd> tag describes each term:
